name: take-home-task
description: Content moderation system with Laravel backend, Vue frontend, and WebSocket real-time updates

scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:deps: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'websocket,laravel,queue,vue' 'npm run ws' 'npm run laravel:serve' 'npm run laravel:queue' 'npm run vue:dev'
